alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central St. Tammany Parish, northwestern Hancock and southwestern Pearl River Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1115 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcneil, or near Picayune, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Picayune, Stennis Space Center and Mcneil. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 59 in Louisiana between mile markers 6 and 11. Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
